description.title: About Me
description.paragraf1: I'm a frontend developer with a focus on React, Next.js, Tailwind, WebSocket, and Node.js. I'm also familiar with backend: Node.js (NestJS), express, PostgreSQL.
description.paragraf2: I'm looking for a job as a frontend developer.

items.title: Interactive Markdown Editor
items.description: A full-featured markdown editor with support for emojis, GIFs, live preview, and custom infographics. Built with React, Zustand, and the Giphy API.

items.title: Visual DSL Editor
items.description: A block-based editor for building object behavior, featuring drag-and-drop, JSON export, and a built-in interpreter.

footer.text: Maksim | Site made with Next.js, Tailwind, and framer-motion
